de.bit.pl02.pp5.task02

Class MetaDataAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.bit.pl02.pp5.task02.MetaDataAPI

  • public class MetaDataAPI
extends java.lang.Object
    MetaDataAPI receives metadata from the SQLite database upon querying by the getForAPI method in the database class.
    Author:
    Shreya Kapoor, Sophia Krix, Gemma van der Voort
